LanguageData.AdvancedStocking.Label: Advanced Stocking
LanguageData.InRackMode.Label: Rack Mode
LanguageData.InRackMode.ToolTip: Whether this shelf supports multiple items being racked on the same square. Some storage configurations do not allow racking!
LanguageData.InPriorityCyclingMode_tooltip: Will smartly increment storage priority when empty and decrement when full
LanguageData.InForbiddenMode_tooltip: Will auto forbid any items placed within. Very useful for caravan storage. Also full stock pushing will ignore forbidden items ...
LanguageData.IsOverstackModeEnabled_tooltip: Will combine two stacks of the same item into a larger stack than normally possible
LanguageData.IsOverlayModeEnabled_tooltip: Will place multiple items on top of each other in the same cell
LanguageData.AutoOrganizeAfterFilling_tooltip: Will automatically organize afer filling with an item
LanguageData.StockJobPriorities_tooltip: Alter priorites for the various stocking jobs or disable
LanguageData.Organize_Stock_Priority_Tooltip: Will combine multiple stacks of a similar item
LanguageData.Fill_Empty_Stock_Priority_Tooltip: Will attempt to gather items from other storage locations to fill empty spaces. Highest priority
LanguageData.Push_Full_Stock_Priority_Tooltip: Will push any full spaces to an equal or higher priority storage location
LanguageData.FillEmptyStock_NoItemsFound_JobFailReaso: No available items in lower priority storage
LanguageData.StockingLimits.Label: Stocking Limits
LanguageData.OverlayLimit.Label: Racks ({0} in use)
LanguageData.OverlayLimit.ToolTip: Select the number of items that can be placed on the same square. Note, this impacts the maximum stacklimit of each of those items; as your racks increase, your stacklimits will decrease.
LanguageData.StackLimit.Label: {0} (max {1})
LanguageData.StackLimit.ToolTip: The maximum number that can be placed in stack.
LanguageData.AS.ReservedItem.ToolTip: This represents an item that has its place reserved on the highlighted cell {0}. Press the close button remove reservation
LanguageData.AS.ReservationsRootNode.Label: Reservations
